message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further, but it's your choice to accept or risk losing more in later rounds.
I'll give you a better deal. Take 60% and I'll take 40%. We can still negotiate further, but this is a fair starting point.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a better deal. Let's try 70/30. We both get more than your last offer, and we can still work out a compromise in the future.
I'm not willing to give up too much more. I'll offer 50/50, but this is my final offer. If you don't take it, I'll take what I can get in the next round.
